name: BlockChain Signals 02 - HODL
description: BlockChain Signals are a collection of phrases common in our community that have been translated from an ASCII string into an audio file using OsciStudio Livecoding techniques represented as an x,y signal played through an oscilloscope emulator. The result is visually depicted while listening to the audio signal source to juxtapose the digitization of the human experience and consider the abstraction of data into art.
